import React, { useState} from 'react'; import './Home.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function SignUp() { let [fullname,setFullname] = useState(); let [username,setUsername] = useState(); let [position,setPosition] = useState(); let [password,setPassword] = useState(); const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(fullname, username, position, password); } return (

setPassword(e.target.value)} />
